mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(thumb_num), 0) AS thumb_num, IFNULL(SUM(share_num), 0) AS share_num, IFNULL(SUM(collect_num), 0) AS collect_num, IFNULL(SUM(comment_num), 0) AS comment_num, IFNULL(SUM(play_num), 0) AS play_num, account_id FROM social_media_work WHERE user_id in (${userId}) GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY play_num DESC

SELECT platform_id, IFNULL(SUM(thumb_num), 0) AS thumb_num, IFNULL(SUM(share_num), 0) AS share_num, IFNULL(SUM(collect_num), 0) AS collect_num, IFNULL(SUM(comment_num), 0) AS comment_num, IFNULL(SUM(play_num), 0) AS play_num, count(*) as work_num, account_id FROM social_media_work
WHERE user_id in (${userIds})
GROUP BY platform_id
